title: Oceans Of Desire: Holiday Heat Book 3
description: The week on a Greek island paradise comes to a passionate and steamy conclusion...Rob, Suzie, Donna and Kevin are all hiding indiscretions from the partners with whom they arrived on the island . How much longer can those secrets remain hidden, and what will happen when the truth comes out?OCEANS OF DESIRE is the third and final part of HOLIDAY HEAT, a trilogy of romance and erotica that will leave you breathless.WAVES OF PASSION and TIDES OF LUST, part 1 and 2 of the trilogy, are also available.
author: Cameron Lincoln
